body:
This smells funny - I could clearly agree for maps, as a nil map behaves differently to an empty map (assignments fail for example), but in my example both are slices of the same data type, having len() of 0. They are represented differently in memory, but as slice objects - not really different.

I understand the problem at hand, but it still is something that deserves a mention at https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/talks/wat
